comment.description:
Create a new duckdb vector buffer wrapping an opaque buffer with a function to specify that the memory is no long required by duckdb.
This must be freed with `duckdb_free_opaque_vector_buffer`.

param_comments.buffer: The buffer which should used as a vector buffer.
param_comments.free_fn: A function which will be called once duckdb is finished with the buffer.

comment.return_value: A ptr to the duckdb wrapped buffer.

comment.description: Free the reference to the buffer created from `duckdb_wrap_opaque_buffer_as_vector_buffer`
